name: http://linksys.com/jnap/storage/Storage
desc: This service provides access to a device's mounted partitions.

CreateDirectory.name: http://linksys.com/jnap/storage/CreateDirectory
CreateDirectory.desc: This action creates a directory on a mounted partition.

partitionName.desc: The name of the mounted partition to create the directory on.

path.desc:
The name of the directory to create. This can include parent directories which will be created if needed. Each directory must must conform to the following requirements:
          must be between 1 and 22 characters long
            must not begin or end with a space
            must not begin with a /
            must not be . or ..
            must not contain any ASCII control characters (U+0000 - U+001F)
            must not contain any of the following characters: \ ? * : | < > "
            must not be an existing non-directly file
          
          Relative paths are interpreted as relative to the root directory of the partition.

errors.ErrorInvalidPath: The specified directory is not valid.
errors.ErrorUnknownPartition: The specified partition does not correspond to any mounted partition.

CreateGroup.name: http://linksys.com/jnap/storage/CreateGroup
CreateGroup.desc: This action creates a new user group of the device.

name.desc: The name of the group. This value must be between 1 and 12 characters long and may only contain characters a-z, A-Z, 0-9, dash(-), and underscore (_). Group names must be unique.

description.desc: The description of the group. This value must be between 0 and 63 characters long and may only contain characters a-Z, A-Z, 0-9, dash (-), and space ( ).

hasWritePermissions.desc: Whether the group has write permissions.

errors.ErrorGroupExists: A group with the specified name already exists.
errors.ErrorTooManyGroups: The group cannot be created because the maximum number of groups has already been reached.

CreateUser.name: http://linksys.com/jnap/storage/CreateUser
CreateUser.desc: This action creates a new user of the device.

name.desc: The name of the user. This value must be between 1 and 20 characters long and may only contain characters a-z, A-Z, 0-9, dash(-), and underscore (_). User names must be unique.

fullName.desc: The full name of the user. This value must be between 0 and 63 characters long and may only contain characters a-Z, A-Z, 0-9, dash (-), and space ( ).

description.desc: The description of the user. This value must be between 0 and 63 characters long and may only contain characters a-Z, A-Z, 0-9, dash (-), and space ( ).

memberOfGroup.desc: The name of the group that the user is a member of.

isEnabled.desc: Whether the user's account is currently enabled.

password.desc: The user's password. This value must be between 4 and 64 characters long and may only contain characters a-Z, A-Z, 0-9.

errors.ErrorInvalidFullName: The specified full name is invalid.
errors.ErrorTooManyUsers: The user cannot be created because the maximum number of user accounts has already been reached.
errors.ErrorUnknownMemberOfGroup: The specified group does not exist.
errors.ErrorUserExists: A user with the specified name already exists.

DeleteGroup.name: http://linksys.com/jnap/storage/DeleteGroup
DeleteGroup.desc: This action deletes a group of the device.

errors.ErrorCannotDeleteGroup: The specified group is not deletable.
errors.ErrorUnknownGroup: There is no group with the specified name.

DeleteUser.name: http://linksys.com/jnap/storage/DeleteUser
DeleteUser.desc: This action deletes a user of the device.

errors.ErrorCannotDeleteUser: The specified user is not deletable.
errors.ErrorUnknownUser: There is no user with the specified name.

EditGroup.name: http://linksys.com/jnap/storage/EditGroup
EditGroup.desc: This action edits information about a group of the device.

description.desc: The description of the group. This value must be between 0 and 63 characters long and may only contain characters a-Z, A-Z, 0-9, dash (-), and space ( ).

hasWritePermissions.desc: Whether the group has write permissions.

errors.ErrorCannotEditGroup: The specified group is not editable.
errors.ErrorUnknownGroup: There is no group with the specified name.

EditUser.name: http://linksys.com/jnap/storage/EditUser
EditUser.desc: This action edits information about a user of the device.

fullName.desc: The full name of the user. This value must be between 0 and 63 characters long and may only contain characters a-Z, A-Z, 0-9, dash (-), and space ( ).

description.desc: The description of the user. This value must be between 0 and 63 characters long and may only contain characters a-Z, A-Z, 0-9, dash (-), and space ( ).

memberOfGroup.desc: The name of the group that the user is a member of.

isEnabled.desc: Whether the user's account is currently enabled.

password.desc: The user's password. This value must be between 4 and 64 characters long and may only contain characters a-Z, A-Z, 0-9.

errors.ErrorCannotEditUser: The specified user is not editable.
errors.ErrorInvalidFullName: The specified full name is invalid.
errors.ErrorUnknownMemberOfGroup: The specified group does not exist.
errors.ErrorUnknownUser: There is no user with the specified name.

GetGroups.name: http://linksys.com/jnap/storage/GetGroups
GetGroups.desc: This action gets a list of the device's groups.

maxGroups.desc: The maximum number of groups that can exist simultaneously.

GetMountedPartitions.name: http://linksys.com/jnap/storage/GetMountedPartitions
GetMountedPartitions.desc: This action gets information about the device's mounted partitions.

partitions.desc: The list of the device's mounted partitions.

GetUsers.name: http://linksys.com/jnap/storage/GetUsers
GetUsers.desc: This action gets a list of the device's users.

maxUsers.desc: The maximum number of users that can exist simultaneously.

ListSubdirectories.name: http://linksys.com/jnap/storage/ListSubdirectories
ListSubdirectories.desc: This action gets the list of subdirectories in a directory on a mounted partition.

partitionName.desc: The name of the mounted partition.

path.desc: The path to the parent directory whose subdirectories should be listed. Relative paths are interpreted as relative to the root directory of the partition.

subdirectories.desc: The list of subdirectories in the specified directory. The items in the list are directory names, not paths. The path to a subdirectory can be computed by prefixing its name with the value of the path parameter.

errors.ErrorPathDoesNotExist: The specified path does not exist.
errors.ErrorUnknownPartition: The specified partition does not correspond to any mounted partition.

RemoveStorageDevice.name: http://linksys.com/jnap/storage/RemoveStorageDevice
RemoveStorageDevice.desc: This action removes a physical storage device, unmounting all partitions on the device and making it safe for removal.

storageDeviceName.desc: The name of the physical storage device. This value is associated with one or more partitions and can be retrieved using the GetMountedPartitions method.

errors.ErrorUnknownStorageDevice: The specified storage device does not exist on the system.

partitionName.desc: The name the partition. This value has is merely a unique identifier for a specific partition, to be used as an input argument to various methods.

storageDeviceName.desc: The name of the physical storage device on which this partition is located. This value is merely a unique identifier for a specific physical storage device, to be used as an input argument to various methods.

fileSystem.desc: The file system used on the partition.

usedKB.desc: The amount of space currently used on the partition, in kilobytes.

availableKB.desc: The amount of free space currently available on the partition, in kilobytes.

name.desc: The name of the user. This value must be between 1 and 20 characters long. User names must be unique.

fullName.desc: The full name of the user. This value must be between 0 and 63 characters long.

description.desc: The description of the user. This value must be between 0 and 63 characters long.

memberOfGroup.desc: The name of the group that the user is a member of.

isEnabled.desc: Whether the user's account is currently enabled.

isEditable.desc: Whether the user can be edited. Some users such as admin cannot be edited.

isDeletable.desc: Whether the user can be deleted. Some users such as admin and guest cannot be deleted.

name.desc: The name of the group. This value must be between 1 and 12 characters long. Group names must be unique.

description.desc: The description of the group. This value must be between 0 and 63 characters long.

hasWritePermissions.desc: Whether members of the group have read-write permission. If this value is false, members of the group have read-only permission.

isEditable.desc: Whether the group can be edited. Some groups such as admin and guest cannot be edited.

isDeletable.desc: Whether the group can be deleted. Some groups such as admin and guest cannot be deleted.
